name: .PDFIG File Extension
summary: Learn about .PDFIG files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project file saved by PDF Index Generator, a program used to create book indexes for .PDF files; contains all generated index data, as well as the project settings for the index, such as the input filename, pages numbers to index, and words to include or exclude; saved in an XML format.

content: PDFIG project files can be used to automatically append an index to an existing PDF file. They can be reopened and edited to create new indexes.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
